amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for National Highway Traffic Safety Administration Operations and Research by $1.2 million and to increase funding for the National Railroad Passenger Corporation Office of Inspector General Salaries and Expenses by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment redirects $500,000 to the Amtrak Office of the Inspector General salaries and expenses account for oversight purposes.
